H0.text: Mallard, Mandarin, Red-crested Pochard, Teal, Muscovy and Eider are all types of what. Duck

H1.text: Mallard, Mandarin, Red-crested Pochard, Teal, Muscovy and Eider are all types of what. Bird

H2.text: Mallard, Mandarin, Red-crested Pochard, Teal, Muscovy and Eider are all types of what. Waterfowl

H3.text: Mallard, Mandarin, Red-crested Pochard, Teal, Muscovy and Eider are all types of what. Eend

A4.text: Anseriformes is an order of birds also known as waterfowl that comprises about 180 living species of birds in three families

A5.text: Anatidae, the largest family, which includes over 170 species of waterfowl, among them the ducks, geese, and swans
